TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ApplicationEvents4_WindowActivateEventHandler(Document Doc, Window Wn);
.class public auto ansi sealed ApplicationEvents4_WindowActivateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ApplicationEvents4_WindowActivateEventHandler(Doc As Document, Wn As Window)
public delegate void ApplicationEvents4_WindowActivateEventHandler(Document ^ Doc, Window ^ Wn);

Docs.param: The document displayed in the activated window.
Docs.summary: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event. The WindowActivate event occurs when any document window is activated.
